======Infested low healing boost.======

= Description =

Heals marines by this value + the value set in <!--[asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low] *if*-->[[asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low.wiki|asw_marine_health_regen_amount_low]] if the marine's health is below the percentage set in <!--[asw_marine_health_regen_threshold] *and*-->[[asw_marine_health_regen_threshold.wiki|asw_marine_health_regen_threshold]] they are currently infested.
